title: Woman
lyrics:
Woman
Why're you in my every moment?
Why're you in my every mood?
Though when I look at you
It’s through the pouring rain

Woman

I see you searching for the answer

In another universe

And you’re a world away



Meet me in the place of no goodbye

I’ll be there, you can't miss me

Meet me in the place of no goodbye

I’ll be there, you can't miss me



Woman

You wanted to have everything

But maybe not to this degree

Is this the apogee?



Woman

Such a painful thing to see

When beauty’s told to crouch and weep

In the cloverleaf



Meet me in the place of no goodbye

I’ll be there, you can't miss me

Meet me in the place of no goodbye

I’ll be there, you can't miss me



Meet me in the place of no goodbye

I’ll be there, you can't miss me

Meet me in the place of no goodbye

I’ll be there, you can't miss me



Woman

I say I’m going to leave tonight

Don’t let me go without a fight

You know I wanna stay



Woman

The cord is wearing down to nothing

And love is rolling down your face

As you float away



As you float away

As you float away

As you float away

As you float away

As you float away

As you float away

As you float away

As you float away

As you float away
